info: DO NOT DELETE OR REORDER LINES! THIS WILL MESS WITH THE URL
activities: watch a movie from the IMDB top 100 list
compare MRE food rations from varios nations
build a webapp in a home made hackathon
paint a masterpiece in oil on canvas
draw real life objects in our sketchbooks
design a t-shirt for each other
go to the next local indie artist concert
throw a dart onto a map and visit that place
do an improv photoshooting of each other
work out at a crossfit gym
invent a personality for the other person and attend a singles event
pretend to be tourists in our hometown
visit the comic book section of your local library
record the first episode of your made up podcast
take photos in a coin photo booth
identify plants with a guide book
race to a different town using only hitchhike rides
use up the film in your analog camera
get up early to watch the sun rise
ride a longboard into the sunset
create a list of the top 10 bars in your town and then drink a beer at each one
host a lockdown style webcam dinner party with mini games
dare each other to complete a new item on your rice purity test
act very pretentious at a wine tasting
sidequests: while pretending to be secret spies
unpublished: while counting people who have unusual accessories
